page.title: 02MY HOME IN 1985
page.content:
I live in a detatched bungalow.My bungalow has ten rooms.They are the{ {kitchen,hall,dining room,lounge,lobby, {bathroom,toilet and three bedrooms.}We have two televisions,one black and white and the other a colour one.We have a VHS video recorder.We can sleep five people in our house though there are only four of us.We used to have a {very }small kitchen but we had it extended.In the lounge we have a three piece suite and a small table.We have double glazed windows.We have quite a large lawned garden with a flower border around the edge and a swing in the corner.
{Katharine Marks.
